scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc -p packages\types -w" "tsc -p packages\core -w" "tsc -p packages\processors -w" "tsc -p packages\webapp -w" "tsc -p packages\webcomponents -w" "tsc -p packages\services-ui-react -w" "tsc -p packages\services-ui-preact -w" "tsc -p packages\webpack-plugin-jst -w" "npm run start-bundles" "tsc -p packages\server -w" "tsc -p packages\desktop -w"
scripts.build: tsc -p packages\types && tsc -p packages\core && tsc -p packages\processors && tsc -p packages\webapp && tsc -p packages\webcomponents && tsc -p packages\services-ui-react && tsc -p packages\services-ui-preact && tsc -p packages\webpack-plugin-jst && npm run build-bundles  && tsc -p packages\server && tsc -p packages\desktop
scripts.test: cd packages\core & npm run test & cd ..\processors\lodash & npm run test & cd ..\..\webapp & npm run test & cd ..\..\
